[✓] Provide the disease diagnosis with name and OMIM ID The patient has multiple cardiomyopathy-related phenotypes including left ventricular noncompaction, dilated cardiomyopathy, hypertrophic cardiomyopathy, and left ventricular dilation. The candidate gene ACTC1 (cardiac muscle actin) is strongly associated with these phenotypes in both OMIM and literature databases. From OMIM data, ACTC1 is associated with: - Left ventricular noncompaction 4 (OMIM 613424) - Cardiomyopathy, hypertrophic, 11 (OMIM 612098) - Cardiomyopathy, dilated, 1R (OMIM 613424) The literature confirms that ACTC1 variants result in isolated and syndromic cardiac phenotypes, including left ventricular noncompaction cardiomyopathy. <solution> {'disease_name': 'Left ventricular noncompaction 4', 'OMIM_ID': '613424'} </solution>
